libInfo.name: ImageRenderer
libInfo.desc: Image cli renderer made in python.
libInfo.changelog: Fixed a bug where the image would be monochromed if the image was not in RGB mode, added noSafeConv flag to disable the fix incase it breaks something.
libInfo.author: Simon Kalmi Claesson

dependencies.name: pillow
dependencies.version_note: Tested on above version, most likely works with newer.
